Zombie.Description:
Stinky, undead, shambling, and clothed in mouldering scraps,
what's not to love? Actually a lot, this zombie really wants
to eat your brains!

Banshee.Description:
Glowing translucent from a light that seems to come from
within, this female wraith is seeking revenge and isn't
particular about from whom she exacts it.
It's fight or flight time!

Giant Python.Description:
It's giant, it's snaky, but you know, once you get to know
it, it's not that difficult to deal with. But best to kill
it just to be on the safe side.

Ogre.Description:
This thing is angry, no I mean like berserker level angry,
and did I mention huge? This hulking giant may best be just
left alone, running away may be the wiser course of action
here.
